title: 04/01/22 DPS Hour 1 Mike Florio
itunes:title: 04/01/22 DPS Hour 1 Mike Florio
description:
Mike Florio talks to Dan about Coach Arians move to the front office. Mike says when you are Tom Brady; you don't have to order the code red.
